S.FORM: tɕe iʑora ji-sɤtɕha ri li qaprɤŋar kɤ-ti ci tu tɕe,
nɯ sɤtɕha ŋu tɕe, sɤtɕha ŋu tɕe, stɤmku ??ji ŋu tɕe,
kɯɕɯŋgɯ tɕe, nɤkinɯ,
iɕqha nɯ, kɯ-ɤrqhi tsa ku-ru-nɯ tɕe, ndɯchu phɤri ku-ru-nɯ tɕe tɕe nɯnɯ, nɤkinɯ,
ɯ-phoŋbu nɯnɯ, ʁjɯ kɯ, (015)
ʁjɯ ɕti nɤma, wuma ʑo kɯ-ɤfkrɤχsɤl maŋe ri, (020)
qapri nɯnɯ tɤʑin pɯ-kɯ-ɣe kɯ-fse,
nɯ ɣɯ ɯ-tshɯɣa nɯ ɲɯ-fse.
tɕe nɯnɯ qaprɤŋar tham tɕe to-sɤrmi-nɯ tɕe,
nɯnɯ qapri nɯ tɤʑin pjɯ-ɣi tɕe tɕe,
ɯʑo ɯ-sɯm tɕe nɤki ɲɯ-ŋu,
qapri tɤʑin pɯ-kɯ-ɣe tɕe tɕe, ɯʑo ɯ-sɯm tɕe ɯ-jme nɯ kɯ tɯ-ci nɯnɯ taʁ tu-sɯ-tsɯm,
taʁ tu-sɯ-tsɯm tɕe tɕe iʑo kɤmɲɯ sɤtɕha lonba ʑo mtshu ɲɯ-sɤβze to-ʁmɯɣ pjɤ-ŋu.
tɕendɤre βlama wuma ʑo kɯ-cha ci pjɤ-tu tɕe, pjɤ-sɯχsɤl.
tɕe ndɯchu, phɤri nɯtɕu mdaʁʑɯɣ ko-lɤt.
tɕendɤre iʑora tɕe @jian tu-kɯ-ti ŋu,
wo, nɯnɯ ko-lɤt tɕe tɕendɤre, qapri nɯ ɯ-mthɤɣ ʑo to-xtsɯɣ tɕe,
tham tɕe nɯ ɯ-stu nɯ ajʁa tu-ti-nɯ ŋu ma, (100)
aʑo koŋla mɤ-sɯz-a wo ma,
phɤri kɤ-ɕe nɯra koŋla mɤ-cha-a qhe,
tɕeri nɯ tu-ti-nɯ ŋu.
tɕe nɯtɕu ko-z-rɤʑi.
tɕe nɯtɕu qapri nɯ ko-z-rɤʑi tɕe tɕendɤre,
kɯ-maqhu tɕe tɕe ɯ-phoŋbu nɯ praʁ chondɤre stɤmku kɯ-fse, zgo kɯ-fse, ɲɤ-ɤβzu.
tɕe nɯnɯ sɤtɕha nɯ qaprɤŋar rmi.
tɕe nɯ kɯ-fse ci tu.
